content: That Debilitation is whenever you take a sip of the Drink from your Gourds, you cannot move momentarily. This is incredibly punishing, as a wrongly-timed heal could cause your death. But, the tradeoff for this is that each Sip will heal a staggering 60% of your health. Therefore, this Drink is incredibly strong, and a skilled er who is able to choose the right moment to heal can breeze through fights with this equipped.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'A_Thousand_Days_Inebriation.md', within the main section titled 'A Thousand Days Inebriation'.
The content is as follows:
That Debilitation is whenever you take a sip of the Drink from your Gourds, you cannot move momentarily. This is incredibly punishing, as a wrongly-timed heal could cause your death. But, the tradeoff for this is that each Sip will heal a staggering 60% of your health. Therefore, this Drink is incredibly strong, and a skilled er who is able to choose the right moment to heal can breeze through fights with this equipped.
